description:
Pitcairn has been on the United Nations list of Non-Self-Governing Territories since 1946, following the declaration of the intention by the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Island to transmit information on the High Commission Territories of the Western Pacific (which had included the Pitcairn Islands) under Article 73 e of the Charter of the United Nations.
â€¢	See General Assembly resolution 66 (I) of 14 December 1946
Administering Power
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

Information has yet to be included in the Proclamation establishing an Excusive Economic Zone (Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie and Oeno Islands), Proclamation No. 1 of 1997. 

https://www.un.org/depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/GBR_1997_Proclamation.pdf

https://www.un.org/dppa/decolonization/en/nsgt/pitcairn
name: Pitcairn Islands Exclusive Economic Zone (200 Nautical Mile)
